scenario.name: SIP Registration
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
